name: BuriBoard
description:
Welcome to BuriBoard!
Introducing the first fingerboarding game featuring analogue controls!

And it’s quite simple actually:
1) you move and turn with your left thumb;
2) you make specific gestures with your right thumb to perform over 60+ TRICKS;
3) and occasionally swipe and hold to GRAB your board in air!

The gameplay is based on realistic physics and features 100% BOARD CONTROL.
This means you are allowed to alter the behaviour of the skate in air by rotating and leaning as you wish.

The game includes 3 LARGE SKATEPARKS for you to explore and dozens of obstacles to challenge yourself. Expect half-pipes, rails, stairs, ramps, gaps and more!

BuriBoard features full BOARD CUSTOMIZATION (in development) which enables you to generate thousands of different combinations that match your style and personal taste. You'll be able to customize every part of your skateboard including the grip, deck, bases, trucks and all four wheels!

Feel like making personal adjustments to the mechanics of your skate? Perhaps jump higher? Turn more? Push harder? If so, inspect the introduced TALENT TREE and discover which talents enhance your gameplay.

What’s in for the future of BuriBoard?

BuriBoard is currently in early access and is set to receive many updates in the upcoming months. These updates will focus on further developing in-game features, addressing any feedback from the players and redesign some game mechanics such as the grinding/railing, improving trick animations, sound design, art style and more.

Join the ride and help us make BuriBoard a renowned fingerboarding game by purchasing the early access today!

Note: BuriBoard is an under-development project that will receive frequent updates and features aiming at improving the overall experience.
The current version does not reflect the quality of the final product.
